think_procedure: The first step is to understand the function of the knob from its description. The 'enable_nestloop' knob is used to enable or disable the query planner's use of nested-loop join plans. The next step is to identify if there are any special values that change the function of the knob. In this case, the description does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob. Therefore, this knob does not have any special values and is not a 'special' knob.
